level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this part, the term:
"Commission" means the Home Rule Act 40th Anniversary Celebration and Commemoration Commission established in ยง 1-137.02.
"Fund" means the Home Rule 40th Anniversary Celebration and Commemoration Fund established in ยง 1-137.04.
"Home Rule Act" means Chapter 2 of this title.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: Law 19-168, the "Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Act of 2012", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-743, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 15, 2012, and June 5, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 22, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-385 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-168 became effective on September 20, 2012.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title: Section 1081 of D.C. Law 19-168 provided that subtitle H of title I of the act may be cited as "Home Rule Act 40th Anniversary Celebration and Commemoration Act of 2012".
